      • determineWinner

        public static void determineWinner(int playerPointTotal,
                                   int dealerPointTotal,
                                   MoneyPot moneyPot,
                                   double currentBet)
        Method takes in player and dealer point totals, moneyPot value, and currentBet and returns a system.out to the console screen indicating the winner of the game
        Parameters:
        playerPointTotal: - int value representing the pointTotal in a Player object
        dealerPointTotal: - int value representing the pointTotal in a Dealer object
        moneyPot: - MoneyPot object representing player's total amount of money
        currentBet: - double value representing a player's current bet

      • getDoubleInput

        Method returns the input value into the console as a double
        Returns:
        value: double input value entered by user

        Method returns the input value entered into the console as a string
        Returns:
        value: String input value entered by user

      • playerLosesBet

        public static void playerLosesBet(double currentBet,
                                  MoneyPot moneyPot)
        Method prints a system.out to console screen to indicate the amount of money a player has lost and the amount remaining in the MoneyPot
        Parameters:
        currentBet: - double value representing player's current bet
        moneyPot: - double value representing player's overall amount of money

      • playerWinsBet

                                 MoneyPot moneyPot)

        moneyPot: - double value representing player's overall amount of money

                               Dealer dealer,

        Method prints scores to the console screen
        Parameters:
        player: - Player object representing the player
        dealer: - Dealer object representing the dealer
        playerHand: - Hand object representing the player's hand
        dealerHand: - Hand object representing the dealer's hand

      • validateContinueGameResponse

        public static boolean validateContinueGameResponse(MoneyPot moneyPot)
        Method asks for and validates the user's response to continue playing game. Method takes in a moneyPot variables representing a moneyPot object.
        Parameters:
        moneyPot: - variable represnting the MoneyPot object
        Returns:
        play: boolean value representing whether to continue with the game (true) or quit game game(false)

      • validateCurrentBetResponse

        public static double validateCurrentBetResponse(double moneyPotAmount)
        Method asks for and validates the amount of money the player wants to bet on the current hand
        Parameters:
        moneyPotAmount: - double value representing the amount total money a player has
        Returns:
        currentBet: double value representing the current bet placed by player

      • validateMoneyPotResponse

        public static double validateMoneyPotResponse()
        Method asks for and validates the amount of money for a player to play with in the current game session.
        Returns:
        inputMoneyPot: double value representing the amount of money a player wants to play with in one game sessio
